lead_paragraph: Taking its cue from problems at the 2014 Winter Games in Russia, the Rio de Janeiro facility was prepared to process thousands of drug tests for athletes.

headline.print_headline: Brazil’s Antidoping Lab Reborn as Olympics Near
headline.main: Brazil’s Antidoping Lab Reborn as the Olympics Near

snippet: Taking its cue from problems at the 2014 Winter Games in Russia, the Rio de Janeiro facility was prepared to process thousands of drug tests for athletes.
abstract: Officials at Brazilian Doping Control Authority say their lab is prepared to process thousands of drug tests for upcoming Summer Olympic Games; used World Anti-Doping Agency's independent report on failings of Russian doping lab for 2014 Winter Games in Sochi as guideline for what not to do.
